title: Citizen Drive HTM Stainless Steel Mens Watch CA0590-82A - Overview
description:
Citizen Drive HTM Stainless Steel Mens Watch - CA0590-82A
http://www.abt.com/product/97871/Citizen-CA059082A.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=CA059082A_20160310

The perfect mix of dress and sporty make up this Drive from Citizen HTM timepiece. Featured in stainless steel with a bright white dial 1/5-second chronograph measuring up to 60 minutes 12/24-hour time date and water resistant up to 100 meters.
Features:
• Movement: Eco-Drive B612
• Functions: Date 1/5 Second Chronograph 12/24-Hour Time
• Band: Silver-Tone Stainless Steel Bracelet Fold Over Clasp with Push Button
• Case Size: 44mm
• Case Material: Silver-Tone Stainless Steel
• Crystal: Mineral Crystal
• Water Resistance: WR100/10Bar/333ft Swimming Showering & Snorkeling
